page.title: 19Worth Pond:Reconstruction
page.content: After solving the problems a lining of sand and straw was put down so that sharp stones could not pierce a hole in the lining once it had been put in. After that the lining was put in and the pond was refilled.There was still some money left to buy some plants,fish and special plant containers for the water. A couple of days after the pond was finished there was a torrential down pour during the night and the pond was flooded.This was because the drainage pipe that should have taken the excess water away was broken. The pond was opened on June 9th by Lady Julia Pender. Now there is a kind of island next to the school and they are going to let that island grow wild.There are plants round the outside of the pond.Tadpoles newts,carp and ducks will soon be seen.
